resources.string: Oh, it\'s you! I\'m Christopher, remember me?\nAnyway, I really need help actually...
I\'m trying to hide it, but you know...
I had a big impact on my head just now, don\'t know why, I can\'t remember.
I\'m not hurt, thanks god. But some things are messed up in my algorithms.\nCould you help me to fix theses bugs?
Don\'t worry if you\'re not friendly with computer things, I\'ll help you of course.
